note.p: Burial: St Michael's chapel, Garston Hall, near Speke, Lancashire
Education: Brasenose College, Oxford; BA (1686), MA (1689), MB (1691), MD (1695)

Career: Practised in Chester (to 1698); Secretary to his brother Sir William Norris on his embassy to the Mogul Emperor (1701-1702); afterwards practised at Utkinton, Cheshire; MP for Liverpool (1715-1722)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Hunter; Foster; Segwick
Notes: Sedgwick says wife was Anne Gerard
